titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1185) to reform the Federal deposit insurance system, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1185) to reform the Federal deposit insurance system, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-70, by Mr. Sessions.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendent in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Financial Services now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 34.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 255.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1185) to reform the Federal deposit insurance system.
